resources.string: Text Tools needs this to be turned on to provide the text expander feature! IMPORTANT: Please note that turning this on will give our accessibility service the ability to replace all the keywords that you\'ve set up through our app! All data collected through this service never leaves your device. No data is sent to the developer or third parties. Learn more at https://github.com/lochidev/playstore/blob/main/privacypolicy.md
